articles.title: Solar storm today! Earth will be hit by a massive CME cloud, warns NOAA; geomagnetic storm likely - HT Tech
articles.description: NOAA forecasters have revealed that a solar storm can occur later in the day as a coronal mass ejection (CME) cloud is expected to deliver a blow to the Earth, sparking a geomagnetic storm and auroras too. Check details.
articles.content: This week's solar storm prediction models had earlier claimed that today, July 1, was likely to be the worst affected by solar activities. The prediction is likely to come true as a coronal mass ejec… [+1953 chars]

articles.content: On Saturday, July 1, the Gujarat High Court rejected the regular bail application of activist Teesta Setalvad and ordered her to surrender immediately. The Gujarat High Court ruling came with regard … [+2702 chars]

articles.title: Monsoon session to be held from July 20 to August 11 - Rediff.com
articles.description: The monsoon session is expected to commence in the old Parliament building and later move to the new building, sources said. The new building was inaugurated by Modi on May 28.
articles.content:
Parliament's monsoon session will start on July 20 and continue till August 11, Parliamentary Affairs Minister Pralhad Joshi said on Saturday.
